Description: Fragment of round handle to sharpish turn of Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Rectangular stamp. Clay fine pink-buff; cream slip.
Curator's comments: Name Leontidas. Petrie diary, 1884-1885 (EES Archive XVII 47), 25, 3. From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0169.21.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.1113)
